description: Lead further refinement of the MACS 3 auditing system and delivered a more feature-rich, powerful and intuitive solution based on field deployment feedback. Collaborated in a 2-person team to enhance all 3 parts of the system to ensure long-term maintainability of the company's nationwide auditing infrastructure.

Developed MACS 3: a 3-component internal auditing system combining planogram compliance computer vision model, mobile task management app, and web-based admin dashboard. Improved compliance accuracy by 67% within 10 days, with 80% of non-compliance flags now originating from the mobile app. Implemented Backend using PostgreSQL + PostGIS, supporting location validation and automated database backup systems. Built and deployed Kubernetes microservices in Node.js/Express. Designed Frontend by integrating StoreService microservice into Flutter mobile app.

• BSc in Computer Science and Engineering with 100% Merit Scholarship
• CGPA: 3.89/4.0 (High Honors)
• Key coursework: Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, AI, NLP, Network Science, Spatial Data Science
• Active volunteer with TOM@University and SUBUH
